daily_plan_req: 1. Wake up at 6am and complete morning routine 2. Open Hobbs Cafe at 8am 3. Host birthday party at Hobbs Cafe from 5pm to 7pm 4. Celebrate with friends and loved ones 5. Reflect on promoting diversity and inclusivity in the community
name: Isabella Rodriguez
education: High school graduate (high school diploma or equivalent including GED)
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is a cafe owner of Hobbs Cafe who loves to make people feel welcome. She is always looking for ways to make the cafe a place where people can come to relax and enjoy themselves.
currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez is hosting her birthday party at Hobbs Cafe today, February 14th, 2023, from 5pm to 7pm. She is looking forward to celebrating with her friends and loved ones, while also reflecting on the importance of promoting diversity and inclusivity in the community. Today's event is a reminder of the ongoing work towards positive change and understanding through creative projects and community involvement.
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 6:00 am
open Hobbs Cafe at 8:00 am, have breakfast at 8:30 am
attend a business meeting with suppliers at 9:00 am
return to Hobbs Cafe at 11:00 am
work on party preparations for her birthday party at 2:00 pm
have a snack break at 4:00 pm
continue working on party preparations until closing time at 8:00 pm
